A diet high in fiber, vitamins, and minerals can also help prevent cancer-related malnutrition and support the body's natural defense mechanisms. In addition, certain nutrients such as vitamin D, omega-3 fatty acids, and antioxidants have been shown to have anti-cancer properties. permalink
The Benefits of Nutrition in Cancer Treatment
Nutrition can play a crucial role in cancer treatment. A well-balanced diet can help reduce the side effects of chemotherapy and radiation therapy, improve overall quality of life, and enhance treatment outcomes. Proper nutrition can also help support the body's natural defense mechanisms and reduce the risk of cancer recurrence. A diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains can provide essential nutrients and antioxidants that help protect against cancer cell growth and damage. permalink
